content: I was just wishing we had an #appreciation. I'm reading Tom's "Basic Category Theory" and it's great :+1:
This topic was moved here from #general: meta > #appreciation and #coappreciation by Matteo Capucci

You are a genie :blush:

Thanks :+1: Btw, I would just call the stream #general: appreciation

The "co/" was meant as a joke (not a good one I guess :sweat_smile: )
I think we all like 'co' jokes around here :laughing: also didn't you say there's usually also a dual to #appreciation? I thought of putting everything in the same stream
(Check the stream description: is it good? I drafted based on what you said, but having never come across an #appreciation stream idk if it's spot-on.)
I like it and I'm still sad, some years later, that somehow I lost my hardcover version that I got not long after it came out.
